dict.acceptation: 旅游，出行；摔倒，绊倒；绊（使某人跌倒的动作）；错误，过失；
绊倒，绊；旅行；轻快地走，跳；
使犯错误；松开（离合器等）以开动；

sent.orig: DP steel has better work hardening ability while TRIP steel has better bake hardening ability.
sent.trans: DP钢拥有更加优良的加工硬化能力，TRIP钢则具有较为理想的烘烤硬化能力。

sent.orig: An optimized cooling process of TRIP steel was put forward based on analysis of experimental data.
sent.trans: 在分析实验数据的基础上，提出了TRIP钢轧后最佳冷却工艺。

sent.orig: TRIP can handle the whole domain routing preferably as a universal tool of exchanging routing information.
sent.trans: TRIP技术作为通用的交换路由信息的工具可以较好地实现NGN全域路由。
高强度高延性合金技术(TRIP)是一项新技术。

sent.orig: Static softening between passes of TRIP steels A and B was measured by double-pass compression test.
sent.trans: 采用双道次压缩试验AB两种TRIP钢进行了软化率曲线的测定。
